    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
    var amount = g_form.getValue('variable_name'); // Replace 'variable_name' with your actual catalog variable name
    var sourceCurrency = g_form.getValue('currency_test'); // Assuming newValue is the selected currency value

    if (amount && sourceCurrency) {
        convertToUSD(amount, sourceCurrency, function(usdAmount) {
            alert('Converted amount in USD: ' + usdAmount);
            // Optionally, set the converted amount to another variable
            g_form.setValue('total_test', usdAmount); // Replace 'variable_usd_amount' with the target variable name
        });
    }
}

function convertToUSD(amount, sourceCurrency, callback) {
    var ga = new GlideAjax('ConvertToUSD');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'convertToUSDClient');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_amount', amount);
    ga.addParam('sysparm_source_currency', sourceCurrency);
    ga.getXMLAnswer(function(response) {
        var usdAmount = response;
        callback(usdAmount);
        g_form.setValue('total_test', usdAmount);
    });
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-26 16:18:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>56e4d2114743021036c69e20116d43d7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>currency</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Travel Request" source="x_1196900_travel_0">a0b497e74732021005303b12d16d43d6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Travel Request">a0b497e74732021005303b12d16d43d6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_56e4d2114743021036c69e20116d43d7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-27 06:09:05</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
